reviewText: Hey, hey, hey !It's your favorite smart bear in a classic holiday romp !  In it, Yogi and his pal Boo Boo head to the big city to spend Christmas with Huckleberry Hound, Snagglepuss, Quick Draw McGraw, and other Hanna-Barbera characters.  Unfortunately, the gang is on their way to Jellystone Park for the same thing, much to Ranger Smith's dismay.  So everyone goes back to the city where they find Yogi dressed in a Santa Claus outfit helping a lost little girl find her father.  In the end, it turned out to be a happy holiday after all.As a bonus, they've thrown in the special "Yogi's Birthday Party" where Ranger Smith and the gang get ready for a surprise party for Yogi, who thinks he's gonna do a showstopping act even though he's not a good actor.  But it turned out to be a real surprise for Yogi, after all.I do remember seeing both specials on TV, but - get this - on Nickelodeon, not Cartoon Network (that channel came MANY years later).  This DVD isn't much, but it's a rather nice holiday treat for you, especially since there's a brand new Yogi Bear movie in theaters in 3D !  It's better than your average flick !
Title: N/A
